Articles.Content: maybe i\'m doing something wrong but i keep seeing these pics with multiple capsules on each craft and nowhere in my huge parts list can i find the ability to add them on mine. how do you people do it?

Most of those pictures come from before .12 (or was it .11?) when there was no capsule selection screen. The capsule was listed under command and control so people would stick more on (especially since they were the only control mechanism we had for a while). Now, you need to copy the capsule and declare it as a strut or something like that since rockets can only have one command pod right now.
